about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Bring back the origins of CSX, take on new challenges and explore more on Sand Patch Grade with Train Sim World®: New Journeys - CSX SD40.

Potent diesel power with a heritage twist comes to life on Sand Patch Grade with the venerable SD40, resplendent in its early CSX Blue & Gray scheme. CSX Transportation was formed 1986, and the new freight giant soon ushered in this two-toned livery across their fleet. Take charge of heavy freight and switching operations with this all-time American classic.

Please note: Train Sim World®: Sand Patch Grade Route Add-On is required, as a separate purchase, in order to utilise the content featured in this add-on.

Key Features


  • SD40 in early CSX Blue & Gray livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • 3 detailed and engaging scenarios on Sand Patch Grade
  • Substitutions available for all existing SD40-2 Timetable Services on Sand Patch Grade
  • Livery Designer, Scenario Planner and Creators Club compatible
  • Download size: 291.53 MB
